channel.title: photo gallery on Pelotons
channel.description: Recent content in photo gallery on Pelotons

item.title: Girona, Spain
item.description: A photo-gallery of three days riding out of the old town. Both gravel and road including a run to the coast, the famous climbs of Els Angels and Rocacorba.

item.title: The Tuscany Trail, Italy
item.description: A photo-gallery riding a gravel route on the famous Strade Bianchi across the countryside of Tuscany. Approximately 600km ridden at a “coffee ride” pace over four or five days with 3,000 other bike-packers.
